name: Stay Asleep
description:
Dreams are real while they last -- can we say more of life? ~Havelock Ellis

Stay asleep is a lucid dream simulator. Try to stay asleep by following the orb, and avoid the obstacles.

Made in a week during Isart digital's gameweek.

The gameweek is a weeklong game jam organized by our school, Isart digital where all the students (artiste, designer, programmer, producers) come together to make great games !

We put together this small VR game for cardboard. This was our first experience with virtual reality.

We hope you'll enjoy it as we enjoy making it !

As per the school rules, we cannot put the app on the play store so you have to allow unknown sources on your device to install the game. You may also want a powerful device to avoid any lag (and lag can be really annoying in vr). Of course, you need a Google cardboard,
